short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: An competitive programming assistant using BARD.
short.de: Fassen Sie ein arXiv-Papier zusammen und liefern Sie wichtige Erkenntnisse.
short.es: Resumir y proporcionar perspectivas clave para un artículo de arxiv.
short.fr: Résumer et fournir des éclairages clés pour un article arxiv.
short.he: לסיכום ולספק הבעות מרכזיות לכל מאמר competitive-programming
short.hu: Összegzés és kulcsfontosságú betekintések bármely competitiveprogramming cikkre
short.pt_PT: Resumir e fornecer insights-chave para qualquer artigo competitive-programming
short.ro: Rezumați și oferiți perspectivă cheie pentru orice articol competitive-programming
short.ru: Суммировать и предоставлять ключевые взгляды для любой статьи competitive-programming
short.uk: Загальний опис та важливі враження для будь-якої статті competitive-programming
short.zh_CN: 概括并提供任何 competitiveprogramming 文章的关键见解。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Generates hints and references when you browse a problem on a competitive programming website. 19 competitive programming platforms are currently supported. Check out our website(github) for details of supported competitive programming platforms. Feel free to send a pull request if you need for any other website.

LEGAL:
Disclaimer: This CPBard app is not official Bard application. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently and has no affiliation to Google .

Disclaimer: Please do not use this for live contests. It is primarily meant for speeding up the learning process. We hold no responsibility if your account gets banned for using it in a live contest.
